quotes.quote: We have natural tendencies to achieve neatness and tidiness. However, most times, we are blindsided by chaos.

Yet, when I look upon the neat stacks of clothes in any bed and bath outlet, the joy in my heart erupts, spewing out memories and makes me feel like I am in a soft tufted cloud, floating above all my cares.
A nice, neat stack of fresh folded clothes can usually uplift the most sombre moods.
The comfort and luxury of a home is unmatchable and this if kept clean and maintained well accounts for a blissful living.
A clean home is enticing and gives a sense of uplift. It also imparts a sense of accomplishment and clearly exhibits the hosts personal style and taste.
The act of tidying is a series of simple actions in which objects are moved from one place to another.
A clear and clean space radiates positive energies and harmony. People's moods change and they become more receptive.
If your idea of tidying is getting rid of one unnecessary item a day or cleaning up your room  a little at a time, then you are right.
If you tidy up in one shot, rather than little by little, you can dramatically change your mindset.
No game in the world is as tidy and as dramatically neat as baseball, with cause and effect, crime and punishment, motive and result so cleanly defined.
Homekeeping is a lost art— treat it as such and you'll find some unexpected happiness as you clean and organize your home.
Granted, the house wasn't as tidy as it had been in the past, but it only took a little bit of time and effort to whip it into shape.
Being neat, clean, and organized has nothing to do with gender and everything to do with social style.
Analyticals are normally very clean and organized people. Drivers also tend to have things neat and ares sometimes even militant about being organized.
As men are given responsibility and credit for more of the housework, the idea that men are slobs and women are neat may change.
The man and the woman in a household may  both work full-time, but women still clean more.
Neatness and cleanliness is not a function of how rich or poor you are but that of mentality and principle.
The solution of logical problems must be neat for they set the standard of neatness.
The solution of logical problems must be neat for they set the standard of neatness.
There's one thing about baldness, it's neat.
Life doesn't have a neat beginning and a tidy end; life is always going on. You should begin in the middle and end in the middle, and it should be all there.
I want players to look neat and responsible. Maybe it's old school, but it's kind of neat when people are always clean.
Be regular and orderly in your life, so that you may be violent and original in your work.
It's important to look neat and tidy and not be too flashily dressed. If you look untidy, you're considered to have an untidy mind - it's as simple as that!
Neatness is a crowning grace of womanhood.
As a general thing, an individual who is neat in his person is neat in his morals.
